Interface SecureCommit

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CommitSecLevel, SecurityLevel
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    EquivocalCmt, ExtractableCmt, FullyTrapdoorCmt, NonMalleableCmt, PerfectlyBindingCmt, PerfectlyHidingCmt, StatisticallyHidingCmt
    All Known Implementing Classes:

extends CommitSecLevel
